Razor 1911 proudly presents:
F1 2011
(C) Codemasters

Date: 2011-09-20                    Game Type : Racing
Size: 1 DVD                          Protection: Steam  xlive

Game Notes

F1 2011. is the sequel to the BAFTA winning FORMULA ONE. videogame from
Codemastersr, the developer and publisher of award-winning racing games
Developed under Codemasters. exclusive worldwide agreement with Formula One
World Championship Limited, F1 2011 will come complete with all the official
drivers, teams and circuits featuring in the 2011 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD
CHAMPIONSHIP

Install Notes

1. Extract RARs
2. Mount or Burn image
3. Install game
4. When asked for a serial, use: XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX
5. Copy the whole content from crack dir to your install folder and overwrite
   existing files
6. Run the game by clicking F12011Launcher.exe
7. Use an offline xlive account for saving
8. Let's race
